OPENSHIFT_DOMAIN: for OPENSHIFT_DOMAIN provide the values for subdomain and domain in the below given format (eg. api.ocp.twentynet.local)
OPENSHIFT_PORT: OPENSHIFT_PORT for OCP web cluster console port number (ex: 6443)
LOCAL_STORAGE_VERSION: Provide the Local Storage operator version (ex: 4.12 or stable) for creating Local Storage operator
OPENSHIFT_CONTAINER_STORAGE_VERSION: Provide the OpenShift Container Platform version (ex: 4.12) for creating OpenShift Container Storage
OPENSHIFT_CLIENT_PATH: Provide the OC client tool path if it has not been added to the path (eg. $BASE_DIR/installer/library/openshift_components/openshift-install ). If the OC client path has been added then leave the below field empty
OPENSHIFT_CONTAINER_PLATFORM_WORKER_NODE: Provide minimum three OCP worker nodes FQDNs list (eg: ocp-worker.dns.twentynet.local) for creating OCS labels so that OCS operator PVCs will be bounded
DISK_NUMBER: Update disk value, For each set of 3 disks increment the count by 1, (example: 3 nodes x 1 disk_number = 1)
